short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to view your unsplash views and downloads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays your statistics from Unsplash. 

This includes:
      - Total views and downloads
      - Views and downloads over the last 30 days
      - Views and downloads over the past 24 hours
      - Total followers, which you can't see on Unsplash
      - Uploaded photos count

The only thing that is required to use the extension is your Unsplash username, and away you go! None of the information, including username and statistics is recorded and kept, as per the Privacy Policy.
